review: It would not plug into my TV.  Waste of $39.

review: It is cool and easy to hook up. I am electronically challenged and had no problem.

review: Finally able to get Prime on our older Samsung
author: Melissa Dec

review: Tried It Would not connect to Netflix. Set up A&E; & History Channel and everything I wanted to watch cost money. Didn't Have to do any of that with my Roku Box. Watched Netflix, & Storage Wars, & Vikings didn't cost me a dime. Sorry Amazon.Horrible purchase went back to my Roku and am going to purchase their stick.

review: Better than I thought it would be.

review: It's perfect to just view movies and tv right on my television.

review: It covers my expectatives about tv with internet
author: Jorge S.

review: Love it! Can easily watch what I want or play games. It has lots of capabilities that I haven't even tried yet. Planning to take it on vacation, so the kids will have endless things to watch without lugging discs or all of their devices.
author: SC Dad

review: Best streaming media stick on the market but lacks everything to replace streaming blu-ray player. Excellent speed, size, and best quality.  There is NO Disney movie anywhere app for Disney/ Marvel content and there is NO VUDU access to purchased digital copy's in Ultraviolet library. Flixster app falls far short for viewing and streaming via UV library; poor quality, app design, and doesn't allow for Disney library items to be accessed.
author: Nancy Klimper
